column4: Guys I cant find a tutorial for windows gaming on linux.. http://winehq.org/site/download-deb < i went there and did everything now what should i do help me plz!
what game? basically you install wine then run winecfg then try to run the game like wine mygaminstall.exe
the path to game bit will be ~/.wine/drive_c/Program Files/Blizzardwhatever
